name: phaser3-plugin-easyprogressbar
description: This is a phaser 3 plugin for creating easy to use progressbars

scripts.deploy: git flow release start $npm_package_version && npm run build:production && git commit --allow-empty -m "Prepare release $npm_package_version" && git flow release finish -m "$npm_package_version" $npm_package_version && npm publish && git push origin master
scripts.deploy:fast: npm run deploy && git checkout develop

author: Stefan Neidig <stefan@rpdev.net>
